generation_examples.name: Thai Temple
generation_examples.prompt: Ancient Thai temple with golden spires, intricate architectural details, traditional Thai style, beautiful ornate decorations, dramatic lighting, photorealistic, masterpiece quality
generation_examples.negative_prompt: modern buildings, people, vehicles, poor quality, blurry

generation_examples.name: Thai Food
generation_examples.prompt: Authentic Thai dish with colorful ingredients, steam rising, beautiful plating, professional food photography, soft natural lighting, shallow depth of field

generation_examples.name: Thai Dance
generation_examples.prompt: Traditional Thai dancer in elaborate costume, gold headdress, graceful pose, professional studio lighting, artistic composition, high detail
generation_examples.negative_prompt: modern clothing, casual poses, low quality

style_transfer_examples.name: Thai Art Style
style_transfer_examples.style_prompt: Traditional Thai painting style, gold leaf details, vivid colors, intricate patterns

style_transfer_examples.name: Modern Thai
style_transfer_examples.style_prompt: Contemporary Thai art style, minimalist, elegant, subtle cultural elements

enhancement_examples.name: Temple Enhancement
enhancement_examples.prompt: Enhance architectural details, improve lighting, add golden glow, increase sharpness

enhancement_examples.name: Food Enhancement
enhancement_examples.prompt: Enhance food textures, improve color saturation, add steam effects, natural lighting
